text:
@realDonaldTrump Did you know there are protests coast to coast? #BlackLivesMatter 

Did you know we're getting close to 2 million COVID-19 cases? Folks are still dying, 110,000 souls so far.

And you're worried about a poll and want it investigated.

A fucking poll. #TrumpIsANationalDisgrace
